channel.title: [PI] How does the announcements.ini file work?
channel.description:
Hi guys, Quick question, How does the announcements.ini file work? I edited it with some announcments and I can't find it anywhere, It's not a command or anything.
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] How does the announcements.ini file work?
item.dc:creator: @gergy008 gergy008
item.description:
@gergy008 wrote:

I edited these values and it didn’t work, I still get the basic stuff.

I changed the login messages from client.java manually and I didn’t see a function where these are inserted… I wonder if it’s disabled. I’ll check again and edit this post.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How does the announcements.ini file work?

item.title: [PI] How does the announcements.ini file work?
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

When you log in to your server, it will load the content of announcements.ini and put it in the text box. for example;

Welcome to gergy008scape.
Announcement1 content here
Announcement2 content here
Announcement3 content here

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How does the announcements.ini file work?

item.title: [PI] How does the announcements.ini file work?
item.dc:creator: @giveitup giveitup
item.description:
@giveitup wrote:

It’s whatever you type there, it says it when you join the server… example: announcement: welcome to runescape. When you join the server it will say welcome to runescape in the chatbox

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How does the announcements.ini file work?
